user_story: As a data scientist, I need to be able sum inputs automatically, so I can increase efficiency.
As an analyst, I need to be able to search text in images, so I can search through large documents quickly.
As a data scientist, I need to be able import multiple datasets at one time, so I can aggregate them.
As a manager, I need to be able to add my employees to a group, so I can send them mass notifications.
As a product owner, I need the ability to send push notifications to my phone, so I can easily keep track fo the backlog.
